/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The buildings that flank the street are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
